Text.Page: You helped Millia work on a Farmer's Almanac.

Freeholds is famous for its specialty produce. I would like to make a Farmer's Almanac to sell, but I am just too busy.

, would you help me with it? I'll credit you as a contributor. Think about it. This idea could catch on!"Make me "co-author," and I'm in."

It's a deal. Here's what I've got so far. Just try to fill in the missing parts.

The general structure is already complete, so all you really need to do is collect some fruits and vegetables and sketch them in on the proper pages.

Thank you so much!

How's it going with the almanac? Let's see what you've got so far...

You finished it! That's great! Thank you so much. , I'll make sure you get listed as co-author.

In the meantime, here: Let me give you this as a token of my appreciation. You should find it very useful.
